page.title: 12LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: GEC Avionics employs 6000 people on the Rochester Airport site.They are the largest employer now in the Medway Towns.They make electronic equipment for aircraft and rockets.They make micro chips on defence systems.Their products are used by several Governments.They have 2 other factores outside the area .The Industrial Estate is situated west of Rochester Airport.There are 24 factories/units that employ 1010 people.Some companies employ only a few people,others up to 172 people.They are varied in tpye from service industres to engineering works.Electronics to medical equipment from packaging to telephone equipment. The new Crest Hotel at Rochester Airport has 71 double rooms and 34 single rooms.They employ 92 people.
